item.title: Contact
item.description: Below are my preferred contact methods in order of preference. Most of them are end to end encrypted allowing for greater privacy for both users. Matrix: @patrick:patrickcking.chat Signal: +15038054667 E-Mail: patrick@patrickcking.com Please use PGP/MIME. My public email subkey can be found here. Keybase: keybase://chat/king SMS Text Message Phone Calls Other forms of communication should be encrypted with my GPG public key (0x2A590EC935F55DB1) if you want our communication to remain encrypted.
